Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward 3
City of Grambling Prop.#1 -- Prop.#1 - 6.50 Mills - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 1
 (Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 6.50 mills property tax continuation for the purpose of paying a part of the cost of improving and maintaining streets in the City.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Grambling, Parish of Lincoln, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy a tax of six and fifty hundredths (6.50) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $61,527.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of paying a part of the cost of improving and maintaining streets in the City?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Grambling Prop.#2 -- Prop.#2 - 5.50 Mills - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 5.50 mills property tax continuation for providing additional support to the Grambling City Police Department.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Grambling, Parish of Lincoln, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy a tax of five and fifty hundredths (5.50) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $57,061.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of providing additional support to the Grambling City Police Department?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Grambling Prop.#3 -- Prop.#3 - 32 Mills - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 3
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 32 mills property tax continuation for providing support for works of public improvement and additional support to the Grambling City Fire Department.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Grambling, Parish of Lincoln, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy a tax of thirty-two (32) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $302,894.00 reasonably expected at this time from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, thirty-five percent (35%) of the proceeds to be collected by the City from the levy of the tax to be used for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating works of public improvement for the City and the remaining 65% of the proceeds of the tax to be used for providing additional support to the Grambling City Fire Department?
